short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns your new tab page into epic, interactive, animated, and customizable backgrounds with a sick search bar! Created by Owaiso :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension revamps the new tab page making an interactive real time animated backgrounds with a awesome search bar!

Backgrounds:
Neon, Hexagon, Fireflies, Plaid, Water, Ghost, Lasers, 3d Cubes

UI Styles:
Clear (color customizable), Glass (color customizable), Rainbow, Glass Rainbow

EPIC New Tabs will never collect or sell your data.
